page.title: 02HUDDERSFIELD OPEN MARKKET
page.content: Our block has many different types of shops. Out of town shoping streets,two large Hypermarkets,and several large D.I.Y. stores, but we thought the most interesting was the Open Market. Tuesday and Saturday are second-hand markets with clothes, materials, shoes, jewellery and many other intersting things. People come because it is close to where they live and they can get bargains. The Monday and Thursday Market is much busier with about 18O stalls selling mostly clothes, materials and vegetables. The market is in the old wholesale vegetable market built in 1888 and renovated in 1980. It is a large Victorian, iron and glass building, painted in maroon, yellow and gold. It is a very popular and busy market.
